message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item is valued at $180 by us, reflecting its high quality and unique features. We believe it could significantly enhance your experience and bring value to your life. Would you be interested in exploring this opportunity further?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can we meet in the middle at $150?
